attributes.action: attempt to create a European Military and to offer our own troops the chance to join it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure the joint commitment of Europe in the every day global affairs that take place, we the people request the Prime Minister to push the EU to create its own military there for cutting down a single countries invlovement and taking a huge burden from countries like the UK which cannot sustain our current tasks for a long time. A European Military would ensure all EU countries could have a say and would share responsibility. Roughly the same ammount of troops from all EU countries could join and may even go towards bringing Europe closer as well as ease military tensions on individual countries.
